topic: 10. Software safety is a quality assurance activity that focuses on hazards that
options: affect the reliability of a software component
may cause an entire system to fail
may result from user input errors
prevent profitable marketing of the final product
topic_cn: 10. 软件安全是一项质量保证活动，其重点关注那些可能导致的危害
options_cn: 影响软件组件可靠性的危害
可能导致整个系统失效的危害
可能由用户输入错误引起的危害
阻碍最终产品盈利性营销的危害
